item.title: Free Patreon episode - And Then Sparrows Took Their Eyes: Hans The Hedgehog
item.description:
A freebie Patreon episode to give you a taste of the sort of thing we do over there.

Henry tells Mike and Ben the story of Hans The Hedgehog.

www.patreon.com/threebeansalad

Feed: https://feeds.captivate.fm/three-bean-salad/

item.title: What Do We Do with the One Life We’re Given? - Environmentalists, Scientists, Writers & Philosophers Share their Stories
item.description: Paul Shrivastava, Bayo Akomolafe, Michel Forst, Guy Leschziner, Eiren Caffall, Fernando García-Moreno, Natasha Hakimi Zapata, Irvin Weathersby Jr., The Club of Rome, human experience, eco-civilization, neuroscience, creative process podcast, creative process, creativity, arts, culture, Mia Funk, Feed: https://thecreativeprocess.squarespace.com/oneplanet1?format=rss
